name: ModifyStatusPagePostUpdate
description:
Update a specific status page post update.

Use this tool to update details of a specific status page post by providing the required Post ID and Post Update ID. Appropriate for modifying existing post updates.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the resource to be updated.

parameters.description: The unique ID of the Status Page Post to be updated.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Status Page Post.

parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific status page post update to be modified.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Status Page Post Update.
